sourcesContent:
import enLocale from 'element-ui/lib/locale/lang/en'
import zhLocale from 'element-ui/lib/locale/lang/zh-CN'

export const messages = {
    'zh': {
        i18n: {
            document:'官方文档',
            btn: '切换英文',
            system_name:'PlatONE 运维管理系统',
            bkh:'高度',
            txh:'交易哈希',
            miner:'出块节点',
            time:'时间',
            txcnt:'交易数量',
            sccnt:'合约列表',
            nodeList:'节点列表',
            viewAllBks:'浏览所有区块',
            viewAllTxs:'浏览所有交易',
            scName:'合约名称',
            account:'账号',
            role:'角色',
            cnsList:'CNS列表',
            version:'版本号',
            addr:'地址',
            userList:'用户列表',
            node:'节点',
            bkList:'区块列表',
            txList:'交易列表',
            gasUsed:'Gas消耗',
            size:'区块大小',
            deploy:'部署合约',
            createDate:'创建日期',
            currVersion:'当前版本号',
            currAddr:'当前地址',
            explorer:'区块浏览器',
            blocks:'区块浏览',
            bkDetail:'区块详情',
            txs:'交易浏览',
            txDetail:'交易详情',
            contracts:'合约浏览',
            scDetail:'合约详情',
            system:'系统管理',
            mainPage:'首页',
            tags:'标签选项',
            closeOthers:'关闭其他',
            closeAll:'关闭所有',
            logout:'退出登录',
            fullScreen:'全屏',
            cancel_fullScreen:'取消全屏',
            admin:'超级管理员',
            user:'用户',
            lastLoginTime:'上次登录时间',
            lastLoginIP:'上次登录IP',
            txStatistic:'七日交易统计',
            searchInfo:'请输入搜索信息',
            noPermission:'啊哦~ 你没有权限访问该页面哦',
            returnHome:'返回首页',
            returnLast:'返回上一页',
            pageNotExist:'啊哦~ 你所访问的页面不存在',
            add:'添加',
            cnsContractName : 'CNS合约名称',
            version:'版本号',
            pinput:'请输入名称',
            scAddr:'合约地址',
            confirm:'确 定',
            cancel:'取 消',
            frozeSC:'冻结合约',
            contractFile:'合约文件',
            dragFile:'将文件拖到此处，或',
            clickUpload:'点击上传',
            twoFile:'只能上传两个文件，其中ABI文件以".json"结尾',
            isSetCNS:'设置CNS',
            login:'登录',
            enterName:'请输入用户名',
            enterPassword:'请输入密码',
            loginSuccess:'登录成功',
            enterNameAndPassword:'请输入账号和密码',
            addNodeAccess:'添加节点准入',
            deployNewNode:'部署新节点',
            removeNode:'移除节点',
            confirmRemove:'此操作将该节点移除区块链网络, 是否继续?',
            removeSuccess:'移除成功！',
            gasConsumeTokenContractName:'Gas消耗代币合约名称',
            isEmptyBlock:'是否产生空块',
            txGasLimit:'交易Gas限制',
            bkGasLimit:'区块Gas限制',
            checkDeployPermission:'合约部署时检查权限',
            reviewAfterDeploy:'合约部署后是否需要审核',
            txConsumeGas:'交易是否消耗Gas',
            firewall:"合约防火墙",
            submitChanges:"提交更改",
            submitSuccess:"提交成功！",
            user:'用户',
            password:'密码'
        },
        ...zhLocale
    },
    'en': {
        i18n: {
            document:'Document',
            btn: 'Switch Chinese',
            system_name:'PlatONE Managment System',
            bkh:'Height',
            txh:'Transaction Hash',
            miner:'Miner',
            time:'Time',
            txcnt:'Transcation Count',
            sccnt:'Contract List',
            nodeList:'Node List',
            viewAllBks:'View All Blocks',
            viewAllTxs:'View All Transactions',
            txDetail:'Transaction Detail',
            scName:'Contract Name',
            account:'Account',
            role:"Role",
            cnsList:'CNS List',
            version:'Version',
            addr:'Address',
            userList:'User List',
            node:'Node',
            bkList:'Block List',
            txList:'Transaction List',
            gasUsed:'Gas Used',
            size:'Size',
            deploy:'Deploy',
            createDate:'Create Date',
            currVersion:'Current Version',
            currAddr:'Current Address',
            explorer:'Explorer',
            blocks:'Blocks',
            bkDetail:'Block Detail',
            txs:'Transactions',
            contracts:'Contracts',
            scDetail:'Contract Detail',
            system:'System Config',
            mainPage:'Home',
            tags:'Tag Option',
            closeOthers:'Close Others',
            closeAll:'Close All',
            logout:'Log Out',
            fullScreen:'Full Screen',
            cancel_fullScreen:'Cancel Full Screen',
            admin:'Admin',
            user:'User',
            lastLoginTime:'Last Login Time',
            lastLoginIP:'Last Login IP',
            txStatistic:'Tx Statistic in 7 Days',
            searchInfo:'Please Enter Search Info',
            noPermission:'Sorry,you don\'t have the authority to visit that page',
            returnHome:'Return to HomePage',
            returnLast:'Return to LastPage',
            pageNotExist:'Sorry,this page does not exist',
            add:'Add',
            cnsContractName : 'CNS Contract Name',
            version:'Version',
            pinput:'Please enter the name',
            scAddr:'Contract Address',
            confirm:'Confirm',
            cancel:'Cancel',
            frozeSC:'Froze Contract',
            contractFile:'Contract File',
            dragFile:'Drag File here,or ',
            clickUpload:'Click to upload',
            twoFile:'only 2 file accepted at one time,ABI file ends up with .json',
            isSetCNS:'Set CNS',
            login:'Login',
            enterName:'Please enter user name',
            enterPassword:'Please enter password',
            loginSuccess:'Login Success',
            enterNameAndPassword:'Please enter user name and password',
            addNodeAccess:'Add Node Access',
            deployNewNode:'Deploy New Node',
            removeNode:'Remove Node',
            confirmRemove:'Will remove the node from blockchain network,continue?',
            removeSuccess:'Remove Successfully!',
            gasConsumeTokenContractName:'Gas Consume Token Contract Name',
            isEmptyBlock:'Allow Empty Block',
            txGasLimit:'Tx Gas Limit',
            bkGasLimit:'Block Gas Limit',
            checkDeployPermission:"Check Contract Deployment Permission",
            reviewAfterDeploy:'Review After Contract Deployment',
            txConsumeGas:'Tx Consume Gas',
            firewall:"Contract Fire Wall",
            submitChanges:"Submit Changes",
            submitSuccess:'Submit Successfully !',
            user:'User',
            password:'Password'
        },
        ...enLocale
    }
}
